data.comment: The match has started at Matmut Atlantique.
Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
In the minute 3, Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 7, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Nicolas De Preville gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bordeaux.
In the minute 10, In Bordeaux, Bordeaux push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Francois Letexier waits before resuming play because Samuel Kalu for Bordeaux is still down.
Samuel Kalu returns to the field for Bordeaux after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Nice!
At Matmut Atlantique, Youssouf Sabaly has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Bordeaux.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Nice are coming forward and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 18, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Josh Maja (Bordeaux) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 23, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Nice.
Toma Basic for Bordeaux drives towards goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Pierre Lees-Melou hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Bordeaux for Nice.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Nice.
Francois Letexier awards Nice a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 39, Nice have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice's Hassane Kamara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Matmut Atlantique the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Bordeaux just outside Nice's area.
Goal kick for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 49, In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Toma Basic. The finish is off target, however.
Francois Letexier awards Nice a goal kick.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick Nice.
Nice's Amine Gouiri breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Francois Letexier awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 54, In Bordeaux Bordeaux drive forward through Toma Basic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Nice's Rony Lopes gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Francois Letexier signals a Nice throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Patrick Vieira is making the team's first substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Alexis Claude-Maurice replacing Dan Ndoye.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 62, Toma Basic for Bordeaux gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Nice.
Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Rony Lopes (Nice) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Hwang Ui-Jo is replacing Samuel Kalu for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Remi Oudin is replacing Josh Maja for the home team.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 70, In Bordeaux, Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Nice.
In the minute 70, Hwang Ui-Jo of Bordeaux gets in a strike, but is off target.
Francois Letexier awards Nice a goal kick.
In Bordeaux Nice drive forward through Kasper Dolberg. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 72, Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 76, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nice close to the penalty box.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Nice push forward at Matmut Atlantique and Amine Gouiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bordeaux defence.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Nice.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 80, Nice's Rony Lopes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
The home team replace Nicolas De Preville with Jimmy Briand.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Youssouf Sabaly with Enock Kwateng. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Nice make their second substitution with Evann Guessand replacing Kasper Dolberg.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a third substitution, with Flavius Daniliuc replacing Jordan Lotomba.
In the minute 82, Nice to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Throw-in Nice.
Dilane Bakwa is on a sub for Yacine Adli for Bordeaux.
In the minute 87, Bordeaux will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nice.
In Bordeaux Nice attack through Rony Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Dilane Bakwa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bordeaux.
Amine Gouiri hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Nice.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Nice's Rony Lopes breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Nice make their fourth substitution with Myziane Maolida replacing Rony Lopes.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) has received a first yellow card.
